original_text: And taking with him Peter and the two sons of Zebedee, he began to be sorrowful and troubled.
korean_text: 베드로와 세베대의 두 아들을 데리고 가실새 고민하고 슬퍼하사

sentences.original_text: And taking with him Peter and the two sons of Zebedee,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그와 함께 베드로와 세베대의 두 아들을 데리고,

sentences.original_text: he began to be sorrowful and troubled.
